## ExtendedVersioningPolicy interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Extended versioning policy interface with optional context support.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ExtendedVersioningPolicy extends VersioningPolicy 
```
**Extends:** [VersioningPolicy](./change-detector-core.versioningpolicy.md)

## Remarks

Backward compatible with existing VersioningPolicy implementations. The classify method signature matches the existing interface. If classifyWithContext is implemented, it is preferred when context is available.
